blogPost.excerpt: With Hashgrow mobile app, you can easily connect your Fb Lead Forms to get instant new lead notifications, send follow-ups via WhatsApp, Email or SMS from pre-set templates. You can also call your leads and track activities.
blogPost.body: With Hashgrow mobile app, you can easily connect your Fb Lead Forms to get instant new lead notifications, send follow-ups via WhatsApp, Email or SMS from pre-set templates. You can also call your leads and track activities.
blogPost.title: Hashgrow - Manage & follow up with Facebook leads
blogPost.author: Jitesh Dugar
